full_summary:
## Annual Fuel Tank Inspection Services at RCMP Detachments in Alberta
### Request for Proposal

**Reference:** PW-23-01026149
**Solicitation Number:** M5000-21-3792/A
**Publication Date:** February 16, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 20, 2023 4:00 PM MDT

**Introduction:**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a service provider to conduct annual fuel tank inspections at RCMP detachments located in Alberta. The contract period will run from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2025, with an option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods.

**Security Requirements:**
This procurement contains security requirements, including the need for all persons working on site to be security cleared at the level Facility Access with Escort, as verified by the Personnel Security Unit (PSU) of the RCMP.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
A bid must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of the contract.

** trencherMethod of Selection:**
The tender must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. The complete tender documents can be downloaded from Canada Buys at the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/16/eb87ab05aa820d7cdb448866ef1591d2/m5000-21-3792a_request_for_proposal.pdf

** Indigenous Procurement:**
This procurement has been set aside for Indigenous businesses under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses (PSIB). Suppliers must certify that they qualify as an Indigenous business as defined under PSIB and agree to comply with all requirements of PSIB.

**Important Notice:**
In accordance with the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS), the RCMP retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on this procurement. Canada is not responsible and will not assume any liabilities whatsoever for the information found on websites of third parties.

Please note that the tender submission deadline and Evaluation Criteria may have changed. For the most up-to-date information, visit the Government Electronic Tendering Service or contact Debbie McPherson at debbie.mcpherson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.
